alert.note: Alert for Dare (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 10:06AM EST until January 03 at 10:30AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN DARE COUNTY... At 1005 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Frisco, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Frisco, Buxton, Salvo, Avon, Waves, Rodanthe, Hatteras Ferry Terminal, Avon Pier and Cape Hatteras Lighthouse. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for eastern North Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
